data.message: Mark, PLEASE RESPOND. I sent you a private message regarding a weird email I got last night from the Facebook ads team

replies.message: Hey Patty. This sounds like someone is sending you spam. Do not click on any suspicious links you may have received. Facebook will never request your password over email, and we advise against providing your information to anyone under any circumstances. Please report this message as spam using this tip: http://bit.ly/2lWPn1H. -Joe
Hi Ahti. This is a great place to ask questions. Let us know how we can help. -Joe

Hi Ahti. If you have reported this issue to our team, please hang tight while we take the time to review the situation. -Joe

Jim, I just saw your 2 comments. I was out of town & just now got home. I'm sorry, I didn't post anything about transgender discrimination
